contradictions.title: System displays July report but crime reference shows as November; handler cannot explain discrepancy while insisting it's one linked incident and 'under investigation'.
contradictions.claim: System displays July report but crime reference shows as November; handler cannot explain discrepancy while insisting it's one linked incident and 'under investigation'.

contradictions.title: Caller states July case was closed; handler states it is 'under investigation' and 'not coming up on the system yet' as closed.
contradictions.claim: Caller states July case was closed; handler states it is 'under investigation' and 'not coming up on the system yet' as closed.

contradictions.title: OIC (Dixon) and both supervisors (Duffy, Palmer) simultaneously on leave, leaving no informed contact for the victim.
contradictions.claim: OIC (Dixon) and both supervisors (Duffy, Palmer) simultaneously on leave, leaving no informed contact for the victim.

contradictions.title: Handler refuses to go through case details citing lack of authority and not being an officer; only offers to email OIC/supervisor and advises 999.
contradictions.claim: Handler refuses to go through case details citing lack of authority and not being an officer; only offers to email OIC/supervisor and advises 999.
impact: Potential misuse of process to avoid updates

contradictions.title: Key audio evidence was listened to and then deleted by the OIC.
contradictions.claim: Key audio evidence was listened to and then deleted by the OIC.
impact: Loss of primary record; reliance on secondary copies/routes
legal_risks: CPIA 1996 Code of Practice — retention of material that may be relevant to the investigation or disclosure
Disclosure schedules (e.g., MG6C) — duty to reveal existence of material
DPA 2018 Part 3 — integrity and accuracy of law-enforcement processing

contradictions.title: Deletion conflicts with later assertions that the case was fully reviewed and managed appropriately.
contradictions.claim: Deletion conflicts with later assertions that the case was fully reviewed and managed appropriately.

contradictions.title: Internal email forwarded externally with third‑party personal data unredacted.
contradictions.claim: Internal email forwarded externally with third‑party personal data unredacted.

contradictions.title: Failure to activate BWV during a key evidential interaction.
contradictions.claim: Failure to activate BWV during a key evidential interaction.

contradictions.title: Suicide attempt on 06-04-2025 was not logged until 17-04-2025 while OIC and supervisors were on leave.
contradictions.claim: Suicide attempt on 06-04-2025 was not logged until 17-04-2025 while OIC and supervisors were on leave.

contradictions.title: Confusion over whether July or November is the live case; call confirms July is live while other messaging suggested otherwise.
contradictions.claim: Confusion over whether July or November is the live case; call confirms July is live while other messaging suggested otherwise.

contradictions.title: Complaints call directs victim to SAR to access files during live safeguarding concerns.
contradictions.claim: Complaints call directs victim to SAR to access files during live safeguarding concerns.

contradictions.title: Persistent emphasis on OIC/supervisors being on leave amid critical safeguarding updates.
contradictions.claim: Persistent emphasis on OIC/supervisors being on leave amid critical safeguarding updates.

contradictions.title: Caller alleges OIC deleted files and moved goalposts to make July evidence look newly submitted.
contradictions.claim: Caller alleges OIC deleted files and moved goalposts to make July evidence look newly submitted.

contradictions.title: Call handler disclosed the OIC’s name(s) over the phone after initially saying they could not discuss details.
contradictions.claim: Call handler disclosed the OIC’s name(s) over the phone after initially saying they could not discuss details.
impact: Personal data disclosure without formal verification
Confirms continuity that both July and November were with same OIC

contradictions.title: Handler labels one case as 'crime other' despite prior emails indicating stalking/harassment.
contradictions.claim: Handler labels one case as 'crime other' despite prior emails indicating stalking/harassment.

contradictions.title: Handler accepts name and DOB in lieu of a crime reference to progress call actions.
contradictions.claim: Handler accepts name and DOB in lieu of a crime reference to progress call actions.

contradictions.title: Verification bypass without crime reference
contradictions.claim: Handler accepts name + date of birth to progress actions and leave a note for the officer without a crime reference.
impact: Inconsistent access control compared to stated policy
